termsAndPrivacy: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
signupDescription: Fill in the form below to create your account
emailDescription: We'll use this to contact you. We will not share your email with anyone else.
passwordDescription: Must be at least 8 characters long.
verifyEmailDescription: We've sent a 6-digit code to your email. Please enter it below.
verificationCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email

brands.title: Brands
brands.description: Manage your brands and their settings
brands.noBrandsDesc: Create your first brand to start managing your brand presence
brands.createBrandDesc: Follow the steps to create a new brand for your workspace
brands.brandNameDesc: The public name of your brand
brands.brandSlugDesc: Unique identifier for your brand (globally unique)
brands.descriptionDesc: A brief description of your brand (optional)
brands.primaryLocaleDesc: Default language for this brand's content
brands.timezoneDesc: Default timezone for this brand's operations
brands.logoUploadDesc: Upload a logo for your brand (can be added later)
brands.brandLimitReached: Brand limit reached for your plan. Upgrade to create more brands.

upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Plan
upgrade.description: You've reached the limit for your {plan} plan

publish.title: Publish
publish.description: Create and manage your content for social media platforms.
publish.title: Publish
publish.description: Create and schedule content for your social media accounts

contentCreation.title: Create Content
contentCreation.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds the maximum limit
contentCreation.onlyVideosAllowed: Only video files are allowed for vertical video
contentCreation.onlyOneVideoAllowed: Only one video is allowed for vertical video. Using the first video.
contentCreation.connectAccountsMessage: Connect social accounts in Social Accounts settings
contentCreation.captionPlaceholder: What would you like to share?
contentCreation.captionTooLong: This content is too long for at least one of the platforms you selected. Maximum {limit} characters.
contentCreation.setDateTimeDescription: Choose a specific time to post.
contentCreation.smartTimeDescription: Let AI choose the best time to post.
contentCreation.smartTimeToast: This feature will be available soon.
contentCreation.smartTimeToastDescription: Smart time selection feature will be active soon.
contentCreation.publishButtonDisabledNoAccounts: Please select at least one account
contentCreation.publishButtonDisabledCaptionTooLong: Caption exceeds the character limit for selected platforms
contentCreation.publishButtonDisabledNoCaption: Caption is required for feed posts
contentCreation.publishButtonDisabledNoMediaInstagram: Media is required for Instagram feed posts
contentCreation.publishButtonDisabledNoMediaTikTok: Media is required for TikTok feed posts
contentCreation.publishButtonDisabledNoMediaInstagramTik: Media is required for Instagram and TikTok feed posts
contentCreation.publishButtonDisabledNoMediaOrToggle: Media is required for selected platforms. Upload media or enable 'Publish without uploading media' option.
contentCreation.useMediaLookupOnPublishDescription: When this option is enabled, even if you don't upload media, files will be searched in Drive during publishing using the media key generated for this content.
contentCreation.scheduleMinimumTime: Schedule time must be at least 10 minutes in the future
contentCreation.scheduleMinimumTimeError: Schedule time must be at least 10 minutes in the future
contentCreation.saveDraftErrorDescription: An error occurred while saving the draft. Please try again.

published.title: Delete Published Content
published.description:
This content has been published on social media platforms.

Deleting from here will only remove it from the system. To completely remove the content, you need to go to the relevant social media platforms and delete it from there as well.

Do you want to continue?

draft.title: Delete Content
draft.description:
Are you sure you want to delete this content?

This action cannot be undone.

default.title: Delete Content
default.description: Are you sure you want to delete this content?

deleteDialog.deleteErrorDescription: An error occurred while deleting the content. Please try again.

contentCreation.mediaDeleteErrorDescription: An error occurred while deleting the media. Please try again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Task
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.

brandIdentity.title: Edit Brand Identity
brandIdentity.description: Update your brand's tagline, mission and vision statements.
brandIdentity.missionPlaceholder: What your brand aims to achieve
brandIdentity.visionPlaceholder: Where you see your brand in the future
brandIdentity.infoTaglineDesc: A short, memorable phrase that captures your brand's essence.
brandIdentity.infoMissionDesc: What your brand aims to achieve. Your purpose and how you serve your audience.
brandIdentity.infoMissionExampleText: Create meaningful digital experiences that connect brands with audiences
brandIdentity.infoVisionDesc: Where you see your brand in the future. Your long-term aspirations.
brandIdentity.infoVisionExampleText: Leading digital experience studio known for transformative narratives

contactChannel.descriptionAdd: Add a new contact channel to your brand.
contactChannel.emailError: Please enter a valid email address
contactChannel.infoTypePhone: Phone: Business phone number with country code
contactChannel.infoLabelDesc: Add a descriptive label to organize multiple contacts of the same type.
contactChannel.infoPrimaryDesc: Mark the most important contact channel as primary. It will be highlighted in the UI.

quickFacts.title: Edit Quick Facts
quickFacts.description: Update your brand's basic information and working hours.
quickFacts.infoPrimaryLanguageDesc: Select your brand's primary communication language. This will be used as default for AI content generation.
quickFacts.infoPrimaryLanguageExamples: tr-TR for Turkish, en-US for English
quickFacts.infoTimezoneDesc: Your brand's primary timezone. Used for scheduling and time-based operations.
quickFacts.infoIndustryDesc: Your business industry or sector. Helps AI understand your context and target audience.
quickFacts.infoWorkingHoursDesc: Set your operating hours for each day. Uncheck days when you're closed.
quickFacts.infoWorkingHoursFormat: Use 24-hour format (e.g., 09:00 for 9 AM, 18:00 for 6 PM)

businessOverview.title: Edit Business Overview
businessOverview.description: Update your business type, market and delivery model.
businessOverview.infoBusinessTypeDesc: Choose what you primarily offer to customers.
businessOverview.infoBusinessTypeService: Service: You provide services (consulting, design, development)
businessOverview.infoBusinessTypeProduct: Product: You sell physical or digital products
businessOverview.infoBusinessTypeBoth: Both: You offer both services and products
businessOverview.infoMarketTypeB2B2C: B2B2C: Both business and consumer markets
businessOverview.infoDeliveryModelDesc: How you deliver your service/product to customers.

coreOfferings.title: Edit Core Offerings
coreOfferings.description: Manage your core services and products.
coreOfferings.infoServicesDesc: List the main services your brand provides. Be specific and clear.
coreOfferings.infoProductsDesc: List the main products your brand sells or offers.
coreOfferings.infoTip2: Focus on what makes you unique

salesChannels.title: Edit Sales & Service Channels
salesChannels.description: Manage your sales channels and transaction types.
salesChannels.infoSalesDesc: How do customers find and purchase from you?
salesChannels.infoTransactionDesc: What are your pricing and payment models?

serviceRegions.title: Edit Service Regions & Structure
serviceRegions.description: Update your business structure and service regions.
serviceRegions.infoStructureDesc: How is your business organized physically?
serviceRegions.infoHqDesc: Your headquarters or main office location.
serviceRegions.infoHqNote: First select country, then city from the dropdown.
serviceRegions.infoRegionsDesc: Geographic areas where you operate or provide services.

persona.title: Add Persona
persona.infoNameDesc: Give your persona a descriptive, memorable name.
persona.infoAgeDesc: Select the age range this persona represents. Choose starting and ending age.
persona.infoDescriptionDesc: Brief description of this persona's characteristics, goals, or behavior.
persona.infoDescriptionExampleText: Urban professional seeking efficiency and reliability
persona.infoPainPointsDesc: What challenges or frustrations does this persona face?

positioning.title: Edit Positioning
positioning.description: Update your brand positioning and unique selling points.
positioning.infoCategoryDesc: How do you categorize or describe your brand in the market?
positioning.infoCategoryExamples: Digital Experience Studio, Premium Lifestyle Brand, Enterprise SaaS Platform
positioning.infoUspsDesc: What makes your brand unique and better than alternatives?
positioning.infoTip: Tips: Be specific, focus on real differentiators, keep each USP concise.

competitor.title: Add Competitor
competitor.infoNameDesc: Enter the name of a competing brand or business.
competitor.infoNoteDesc: What makes them different? What are their strengths or weaknesses?
competitor.infoTip: Tip: Focus on key differentiators that help you position yourself better.

infoDialog.title: Tone Characteristics Guide
infoDialog.description: These sliders define your brand's communication style. Each scale represents a spectrum between two extremes.

editDialog.title: Edit Tone Characteristics
editDialog.description: Adjust the tone sliders to define your brand's communication style.

infoDialog.title: "Do Say" Phrases Guide
infoDialog.description: These are approved phrases, expressions, and language patterns your brand should use in communications.

howToWrite.title: How to Write Them
howToWrite.point2: Focus on your brand's authentic voice

editDialog.title: Edit "Do Say" Phrases
editDialog.description: Manage phrases and expressions your brand should use.
editDialog.emptyState: No phrases yet. Add some below.

infoDialog.title: "Don't Say" Phrases Guide
infoDialog.description: These are phrases, claims, or language patterns your brand should avoid to maintain authenticity and credibility.

whyMatters.title: Why This Matters
whyMatters.description: Avoiding these phrases helps AI generate content that sounds genuine and maintains your brand's credibility.

editDialog.title: Edit "Don't Say" Phrases
editDialog.description: Manage phrases and expressions your brand should avoid.
editDialog.emptyState: No phrases yet. Add some below.

infoDialog.title: Allowed Topics Guide
infoDialog.description: These are content themes and subjects your brand is comfortable discussing publicly. They guide AI content generation.

editDialog.title: Edit Allowed Topics
editDialog.description: Manage topics your brand can talk about.
editDialog.emptyState: No topics yet. Add some below.

infoDialog.title: Forbidden Topics & Crisis Guide
infoDialog.forbiddenTopicsDescription: Topics your brand should never discuss to protect reputation and avoid controversy.
infoDialog.crisisGuidelinesDescription: Rules for how your brand should behave during sensitive situations or crises.
infoDialog.whyMattersDescription: These rules protect your brand from PR disasters and ensure AI-generated content stays within safe boundaries.

editDialog.title: Edit Forbidden Topics & Crisis Guidelines
editDialog.description: Manage topics to avoid and crisis response guidelines.

infoDialog.title: Legal Constraints Guide
infoDialog.description: Legal requirements, compliance rules, and regulations your brand must follow in communications.
infoDialog.exampleDescValue: All paid partnerships must include #ad or #sponsored hashtag as per FTC guidelines

moreExamples.title: More Examples
moreExamples.copyrightValue: Only use licensed content, credit creators when required
moreExamples.gdprValue: Never share client data without consent
moreExamples.medicalValue: Avoid health claims without FDA approval

editDialog.descriptionAdd: Add a new legal or compliance requirement.
editDialog.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the legal requirement or constraint...

infoDialog.title: Brand Colors Guide
infoDialog.primaryColorsDescription: Your main brand colors. These should be used most frequently in your visual identity.
infoDialog.accentColorsDescription: Supporting colors for highlights, CTAs, and special elements.
infoDialog.howToUse1: Click existing colors to edit them
infoDialog.howToUse2: Use color picker to add new colors
infoDialog.howToUse3: Click X button (on hover) to remove
infoDialog.howToUse4: Colors are shown in both dialog and main view

editDialog.title: Edit Brand Colors
editDialog.description: Manage your brand's primary and accent colors.

infoDialog.title: Visual Guidelines Guide
infoDialog.description: Rules and preferences for visual content like photos, graphics, and design elements.
infoDialog.tipsDescription: Keep guidelines actionable and specific. Avoid vague instructions like "look professional" - be concrete.

editDialog.title: Edit Visual Guidelines
editDialog.description: Manage visual style guidelines for your brand.
editDialog.emptyState: No guidelines yet. Add some below.

infoDialog.title: AI Configuration Guide
infoDialog.contentLengthDescription: Preferred length range for AI-generated content.
infoDialog.contentLengthWordsExample: Words example: Min 20, Max 50 (short blog intro)
infoDialog.contentLengthTip: Choose characters for social media, words for articles.
infoDialog.ctaStyleExamples: Examples: Soft, invitational, Direct and urgent, Educational, helpful
infoDialog.preferredPlatformsDescription: Social media or content platforms you primarily use.
infoDialog.preferredPlatformsExamples: Examples: Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, Blog
infoDialog.preferredPlatformsTip: This helps AI tailor content format and style to each platform.

editDialog.title: Edit AI Configuration
editDialog.description: Configure AI settings for content generation.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and workspace preferences
settings.profileDescription: Manage your personal information and preferences
settings.name: Name
settings.timeLocalePrefsDesc: How dates and times are displayed to you
settings.currentPlanDesc: Your workspace is on the {plan} plan
settings.regionalSettingsDesc: Default timezone and locale for the workspace
settings.workspaceMembersDesc: People who have access to this workspace
settings.profilePictureDesc: Upload a profile picture to personalize your account
settings.avatarRecommendation: Recommended: Square image, at least {minSize}x{minSize}px, max {maxSize}MB
settings.cropAvatarDesc: Adjust the crop area, zoom, and rotation to get the perfect avatar
settings.workspaceNameDesc: This will be displayed across the application
settings.slugInvalid: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
settings.slugLengthInvalid: Slug must be between 3 and 50 characters
settings.localeDescription: Language and region settings for the workspace
settings.integrationsDescription: Connect your favorite tools and services to enhance your workflow
settings.googleDriveDescription: Access and import files directly from your Google Drive
settings.telegramDescription: Connect Telegram to receive notifications and updates
settings.usernameInvalid: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores (3-30 characters)
settings.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from this workspace?
settings.changeRoleConfirm: Are you sure you want to change {name}'s role to {role}?
settings.inviteMemberDesc: Invite a user to this workspace by email address
settings.userNotFound: This user is not registered in the system. They need to sign up first.
settings.memberAlreadyExists: This user is already a member of this workspace.
settings.languageDescription: Change the language used in the user interface.
settings.themeDescription: Choose your preferred color theme for the application.
settings.timezonePreferenceWorkspaceDesc: Dates and times will be displayed in your workspace timezone.
settings.timezonePreferenceLocalDesc: Dates and times will be displayed in your personal timezone.
settings.dateFormatDescription: How dates are displayed throughout the application.
settings.timeFormatDescription: How times are displayed throughout the application.

empty.title: No projects found
empty.description: Get started by creating your first project.

form.title: Create Project
form.description: Create a new project to organize your work.
form.name: Project Name
